entity.name: SINE Foundation
entity.description: A Think and Do Tank offering Solutions for Data Sharing Dilemmas. SINE fuses technology with governance mechanisms, enabling organizations to share their data securely, and to maintain their data sovereignty along the way - even after it has been shared.

projects.name: PACT Data Model
projects.description: A Rust implementation of the PACT Data Model for the exchange of Product Carbon Footprints.

projects.name: iLEAP Data Model
projects.description: A Rust implementation of the iLEAP Data Model for the exchange of logistics emissions data, as an extension to Product Carbon Footprints.

projects.name: Demo API for PACT and iLEAP
projects.description: An HTTP REST API implementing the PACT Data Exchange Protocol with iLEAP support
